channel.title: Security-Updates on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Security-Updates on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: dotnet: Announcing the .NET Security Group
item.description:
Microsoft announced the .NET Security Group, a program that gives partners early access to CVE information and coordinates delivery of .NET security patches so distributors can ship fixes at the same time as Microsoft.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: Conda ecosystem support for Dependabot now generally available
item.description:
GitHub Dependabot now supports parsing and updating Conda environment.yml files, providing both security and version updates for Conda-based Python projects; the feature is generally available.

  • Source: GitHub
